file_content.text: Master Ayl. I'm sorry to disturb, but this message must reach you in time.
The situation's grown worse. The thorn in my side knows you're visiting House Rist, and I believe she'll soon give chase.
She's dangerous, Denri. She's in league with my husband and somehow gained access to your personal journals! You're going to need protection.
The situation's grown worse. The thorn in my side knows you're visiting House Rist, and I believe he'll soon give chase.
He's dangerous, Denri. He's in league with my husband and somehow gained access to your personal journals! You're going to need protection.
I know the Rists aren't committed to working for us yet, but I hope you can convince them to help you.
I'm sure you can sway them somehow. You've a way with words.
